body: As friends and family gathered at the funeral of a 19-year-old Connecticut college student shot to death in Brooklyn last weekend, the police arrested a man they thought might be a witness in the case on gun charges. The man arrested yesterday, Jessie Wenzel, 22, was not charged in the shooting of Mark S. Fisher early Sunday morning in Prospect
title: Gun Charges in Case of Slain Student

body: A 42-year-old disabled Brooklyn woman died in a house fire early yesterday, trapped in her burning ground-floor apartment behind two layers of metal window bars, fire officials said. The victim, Denise Kahn, had no way out of her home in a three-story residential building at 58 Bay 28th Street in Bath Beach, fire officials said. The blaze, which
title: Disabled Woman Dies While Trying to Escape Fire

body: Four men died from gunfire in Brooklyn, and a fifth was near death after a fistfight in Manhattan, all the victims of violent altercations between Tuesday afternoon and sunrise yesterday, the police said. About 4:30 p.m. Tuesday, an unidentified 28-year-old man sitting in a car in Bath Beach was shot to death. About an hour later, Khamar Clarke,
title: Metro Briefing | New York: Four Killed and One Hurt In Separate Incidents
